title: Updated Look Ahead: Six GOP presidential candidates headed to NH this week | Politics
content:
Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump, Ben Carson, Jeb Bush, Ted Cruz, Carly Fiorina and Rick Santorum are scheduled to return to New Hampshire this week for town halls and other campaign events. Trump and Carson will be in the state Wednesday.Trump will hold a town hall meeting at Keene High School at 6 p.m. His campaign said it will be his only public stop of the day.Carson has three stops scheduled in New Hampshire on Wednesday. He will hold a town hall meeting at 1:30 p.m. at Ri...
